A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought it was great. I think a lot of people are upset because the plot is rather unpredictable\, and it didn’t meet their expectations. Just relax\, stop making predictions\, and enjoy the show. Plenty of important events happen (and in my opinion in an interesting and logical order)\, there aren’t any plot holes as far as I could tell (both within the movie and within the franchise)\, and the visuals\, sound track\, and acting are world-class. There is some humor but not a lot. It’s the *last* freaking Jedi... yeah\, it’s going to be kinda dark. There are a few head-scratchers but nothing that can’t be clarified in the next movie (I have faith after Rogue One shut everyone up about the Death Star flaw) It’s a weird\, sad\, and very well produced space adventure flick. Don’t freak out when it’s weird and sad\, and you’ll enjoy it too.
